title: my pixel 2xl will not connect with usb after a secuity patch in Android 9
content:
Tried connecting to my pc after a patch on Android 9. You hear the "dong" and it charges OK.
However the ability to select what you want to do with the connection has gone.
The USB ports on the PC work with other usb hardrives.
Changing cables that previously worked have no impact.
Rebooted both PC and phone have no impact.

Never had problems before except since patch  dated 5 March 2019
